name: Old Lady Palmer
descriptions: Lucy "Old Lady" Palmer is a resident of Vault 101 in 2277.
Jonas' grandmother lives alone in her apartment where nothing has changed for decades. She is kind and proud of her grandson, and she bakes the most delicious sticky sweetrolls.

During the escape from Vault 101, one can find a file on the overseer's computer which states that Anne Palmer, her daughter, was the team leader of a scouting party that left the vault to explore the outside world in February 2241.
Palmer is old enough to have retired from work duty in the vault, and therefore no longer has a Pip-Boy.

topics.response_text: Such a nice polite young man you are! Don't ever lose your gift of speaking your mind so directly. We could use more of that down here.Play soundFO3 OLPalmer NiceYoungMan.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_OLPalmer_NiceYoungMan.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Oh, you didn't have to bring me a present, Mrs. Palmer.
topics.response_text: Fiddlesticks! What 10-year-old doesn't like presents?Play soundFo3 LucyPalmer Fiddlesticks.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Fo3_LucyPalmer_Fiddlesticks.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I hope you brought me something better than last year.
topics.response_text: Well now! Young people were more polite back in my day. Respected their elders. Of course, we had a real Overseer back then. Worthy of respect.Play soundFO3 OLPalmer WellNow.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_OLPalmer_WellNow.oggnoicon

Are you having a nice party? Ten years old, my my my. Seems like only yesterday that your daddy came...Play soundFO3 OLPalmer HavingANice.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_OLPalmer_HavingANice.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: Can you believe it? He is growing up so fast.Play soundFO3 OLPalmer HeIsGrowing.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_OLPalmer_HeIsGrowing.oggnoicon
Oh, really? They're lovely! You did such a splendid job.Play soundFO3 OLPalmer TheyreLovely.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_OLPalmer_TheyreLovely.oggnoicon
